name: AvengersNet
description:
Marvel's Avengers need your help! Ultron and his army are determined to destroy the earth with help from powerful villains like Loki and Iron Skull. Connect your Playmation Gear to the AvengersNet app--your direct link to Avengers Headquarters. Track your battle stats, access special missions, and check in with Avengers like Captain America, Iron Man and more. Wherever your real-life adventures take you, stay connected to the Avenger Labs and help defeat Ultron.

CONNECT to your Playmation Device
ACCESS a direct feed into Avengers HQ
BATTLE Ultron’s forces with your Avenger Gear
TRACK your achievements
PERSONALIZE and upgrade Gear
COLLECT intel from the S.H.I.E.L.D. Database
GET tips to defeat enemies
EXPLORE new locations, worlds & more
UNLOCK more missions for your Gear

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains
• links to online stores to purchase real products
• registration to create or sign in using a Disney/an existing account
• as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies
